title: Beautiful 1B1B Apartment W/ Attached Garage in Belmar Area!!!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Come home to One Belmar Place in beautiful Lakewood, Colorado, nestled on the edge of Denver.
Our community is conveniently located in the heart of the city with stunning views of the Rocky Mountains.
Quick access to Highway 121 and 6 puts everything within reach.
Discover all that the Belmar area has to offer, and explore the wide variety of surrounding restaurants, retail venues, and parks.
Choose from any of our eleven floor plans, featuring one and two bedroom layouts.
Attached garages and fireplaces are available in select homes.
Every residence provides an atmosphere of comfort with walk-in closets, high ceilings, washers and dryers, and gourmet kitchens, including stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.
Relax on your own balcony or patio, and experience the higher standard of living you’ve been waiting for.
Monthly pet rent of $35 will be charged per pet.
Please call the office for details.
3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months,12+ months
Prices are based on the market and change daily.
